meanings.definition: A person or thing that converts alcohol into vinegar.
meanings.sent1: The acetifier in the kitchen turned the wine into vinegar.
meanings.sent2: I learned that an acetifier is needed to make vinegar from alcohol.
meanings.sent3: The acetifier at the party magically transformed the wine into vinegar!
meanings.sent4: She was like an acetifier, changing the alcohol into vinegar effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The acetifier worked its magic, creating vinegar from the wine.

meanings.sent1: We need to acetify the wine to make vinegar.
meanings.sent2: The process of acetifying alcohol requires patience.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally acetified the wine when I left it out for too long!
meanings.sent4: Her determination acetified the alcohol, producing high-quality vinegar.
meanings.sent5: The bacteria acetified the alcohol, resulting in a tangy vinegar taste.
